00012 Map::Map(int x, int y) {
00013         this->sizeX = x;
00014         this->sizeY = y;
00015 
00016         this->squareSize = 30;
00017 
00018         this->imageStartPoint = IMG_Load(this->getImage(8).c_str());
00019         this->imageEndPoint = IMG_Load(this->getImage(9).c_str());
00020 
00021         this->rock = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(101).c_str());
00022 
00023         // Set default image to tile
00024         for (int i = 0; i < (this->sizeX * this->sizeY); i++) {
00025                 this->data.push_back(0);
00026         }
00027         for (int i = 0; i < 18; i++) {
00028                 this->tile.push_back(IMG_Load(this->getImage(i).c_str()));
00029                 if (!this->tile[i]) {
00030                         cerr << "Image could not load!";
00031                 }
00032         }
00033 
00034         // Put rocks on map
00035         SDL_Rect rect;
00036         for (int i = 0; i < (this->sizeX * this->sizeY) / 100; i++) {
00037                 rect.x = rand() % (this->sizeX * this->squareSize);
00038                 rect.y = rand() % (this->sizeY * this->squareSize);
00039                 this->rocks.push_back(rect);
00040         }
00041 }
00042 
00043 Map::~Map() {
00044         for (int i = 0; i < 18; i++) {
00045                 SDL_FreeSurface(this->tile[i]);
00046         }
00047         SDL_FreeSurface(this->imageStartPoint);
00048         SDL_FreeSurface(this->imageEndPoint);
00049         SDL_FreeSurface(this->rock);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void Map::draw(SDL_Surface* surface) {
00053         SDL_Rect rect;
00054         // Put rocks on map
00055         for (vector<SDL_Rect>::iterator itRock = rocks.begin(); itRock
00056                         != rocks.end(); itRock++) {
00057                 rect.x = (*itRock).x;
00058                 rect.y = (*itRock).y;
00059                 SDL_BlitSurface(this->rock, NULL, surface, &rect);
00060         }
00061 
00062         // Draw tiles
00063         for (int i = 0; i < (this->sizeX * this->sizeY); i++) {
00064                 rect.x = this->posToPixelX(i);
00065                 rect.y = this->posToPixelY(i);
00066                 SDL_BlitSurface(this->tile[this->getData(i)], NULL, surface, &rect);
00067         }
00068 
00069         // startPoint
00070         rect.x = this->posToPixelX(this->startPoint);
00071         rect.y = this->posToPixelY(this->startPoint);
00072         SDL_BlitSurface(imageStartPoint, NULL, surface, &rect);
00073 
00074         // endPoint
00075         rect.x = this->posToPixelX(this->endPoint);
00076         rect.y = this->posToPixelY(this->endPoint);
00077         SDL_BlitSurface(imageEndPoint, NULL, surface, &rect);
00078 
00079 }

00084 void Map::loadFile(string filename) {
00085 
00086         this->mapLoaded = filename;
00087         ifstream openFile(filename.c_str());
00088         int row = 0;
00089         int column = 1;
00090         string number;
00091         string line;
00092         int choice;
00093 
00094         while (!openFile.eof()) {
00095                 getline(openFile, line);
00096                 stringstream ss(line);
00097                 if (row == 0) {
00098                         size_t findPos = line.find_last_of(',');
00099                         stringstream intStartPoint(line.substr(0, findPos));
00100                         intStartPoint >> this->startPoint;
00101                         this->startPoint--;
00102                         stringstream intEndPoint(line.substr(findPos + 1));
00103                         intEndPoint >> this->endPoint;
00104                         this->endPoint--;
00105                 } else {
00106                         while (getline(ss, number, ',')) {
00107                                 stringstream ss(number);
00108                                 ss >> choice;
00109                                 this->setTile(choice, column, row);
00110                                 column++;
00111                         }
00112                 }
00113                 column = 1;
00114                 row++;
00115         }
00116         openFile.close();
00117 
00118         // set end point as road
00119         this->setTile(1, this->tileToPosX(this->endPoint) + 1, this->tileToPosY(
00120                         this->endPoint) + 1);
00121 }
00122 
00126 void Map::save(string filename) {
00127         ofstream writeFile(filename.c_str());
00128         writeFile << this->startPoint + 1 << "," << this->endPoint + 1 << endl;
00129         for (int i = 0; i < (this->sizeX * this->sizeY); i++) {
00130                 if (i % this->sizeX == this->sizeX - 1) {
00131                         writeFile << this->data[i];
00132                         writeFile << endl;
00133                 } else {
00134                         writeFile << this->data[i] << ",";
00135                 }
00136         }
00137         writeFile.close();
00138 }

00140 void Map::setTile(int type, int x, int y) {
00141         this->data[this->tileToPos(x, y)] = type;
00142 }
00143 
00147 vector<int> Map::getEnvironment(int position) {
00148         vector<int> environment;
00149 
00150         if (position > this->sizeX) {
00151                 // up
00152                 environment.push_back(this->data[position - this->sizeX]);
00153 
00154                 // right
00155                 if (position % this->sizeX < (position + 1) % this->sizeX) {
00156                         environment.push_back(this->data[position + 1]);
00157                 } else {
00158                         // right
00159                         environment.push_back(0);
00160                 }
00161         } else {
00162                 // up
00163                 environment.push_back(0);
00164 
00165                 // right
00166                 environment.push_back(this->data[position + 1]);
00167         }
00168 
00169         // down
00170         if (position / this->sizeX < this->sizeY) {
00171                 environment.push_back(this->data[position + this->sizeX]);
00172         } else {
00173                 environment.push_back(0);
00174         }
00175 
00176         if (position > 0 && position % this->sizeX != 0) {
00177                 // left
00178                 environment.push_back(this->data[position - 1]);
00179         } else {
00180                 environment.push_back(0);
00181         }
00182         return environment;
00183 }
00184 
00185 int Map::getData(int position) {
00186         return this->data[position];
00187 }
00188 
00192 int Map::pixelToPos(int pixelX, int pixelY) {
00193         return static_cast<int> (ceil(static_cast<double> (pixelX
00194                         / this->squareSize))) + (static_cast<int> (ceil(
00195                         static_cast<double> (pixelY / this->squareSize)))) * this->sizeX;
00196 }
00197 
00201 int Map::posToPixelX(int position) {
00202         return position % this->sizeX * this->squareSize;
00203 }
00204 
00208 int Map::posToPixelY(int position) {
00209         return static_cast<int> (floor(static_cast<double> (position / this->sizeX)))
00210                         * this->squareSize;
00211 }
00212 
00216 int Map::tileToPos(int x, int y) {
00217         return x - 1 + (y - 1) * this->sizeX;
00218 }
00219 
00223 int Map::tileToPosX(int position) {
00224         return position % this->sizeX;
00225 }
00226 
00230 int Map::tileToPosY(int position) {
00231         return position / this->sizeX;
00232 }
00233 
00237 bool Map::mouseOver(int x, int y) {
00238         if (this->sizeX * this->squareSize > x && this->sizeY * this->squareSize
00239                         > y) {
00240                 return true;
00241         }
00242         return false;
00243 }

00245 string Map::getImage(int type) {
00246         switch (type) {
00247         case 0: // Default image
00248                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "defaulttile.png";
00249         case 1: // road
00250                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "road.png";
00251         case 2: // acid tower
00252                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "acidtower.png";
00253         case 3: // ice tower
00254                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "icetower.png";
00255         case 4: // stone tower
00256                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "stonetower.png";

00258                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "superiortower.png";
00259         case 6: // chistmastree
00260                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "christmastree.png";
00261         case 7: // grass
00262                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "flyinggrass.png";
00263         case 8: // startpoint
00264                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "starting.png";
00265         case 9: // endpoint
00266                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "ending.png";
00267         case 10: // tree
00268                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "tree.png";
00269         case 11: // box
00270                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "box.png";
00271         case 12: // fire
00272                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "fire.png";
00273         case 13: // water
00274                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "water.png";
00275         case 14: // stone
00276                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "stone.png";
00277         case 15: // RIP stone
00278                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "ripstone.png";
00279         case 16: // tree 2
00280                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "tree2.png";
00284         case 17: // land tile
00285                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "landtile.png";
00289         case 100:
00290                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "ammo.png";
00291         case 101:
00292                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "stonebox.png";
00296         case 1001:
00297                 return Setting::IMAGE_DIR + "mightyoutcast.png";

00300         case 1003:
